name: Minions of Elden Online
description: Minions of Elden Online is a 2D Sandbox Full Loot PvP MMORPG. There are no restrictions. See a weapon on the ground? Pick it up and use it to kill stuff. Find a rare piece of  armor at level 1? Equip it and show off your finders keepers skills...Until another player decides he likes your gear more than he likes you! Join your friends in fighting massive bosses, delving into dark dungeons, and blasting your way through your Guilds enemies!
